and three (3) other 
Science subjects.  
  
Mathematics, Physics and 
one (1) of Biology, Chemistry 
and Geography/Physics.  
  
DIRECT ENTRY  
(i) OOU accepts ND/NCE credit in relevant programme.  
(ii) BENIN andEKSU accept NCE candidates with credits  
in 'O' level Mathematics; ND holders must fulfill the 
UTME requirements.  
(iii) IAUEDrequires two (2) 'A' level passes/NCE in 
Computer Science, Mathematics andPhysics. IAUED 
acceptsND/HND credit inComputer Science, Statistics, 
InformationTechnology andElectronics/Accounting.  
(iv) EKSU accepts NCE merit in Computer and a pass in 
General English in lieu of ‘O’ level English Language.  
(v) BAUCHI accepts NCE pass with five(5)-years teaching 
experience.  
(vi) LASU accepts ‘A' level passes in Mathematics and 
Physics; or NCE at merit in Computer   Education or 
Physics and Mathematics; OR Equivalents of the 
above.  
(vi      BIU same as in Accountancy  
(v) BOWEN accepts 'A' level/IJMB/NCE/ND or approved 
equivalents in Mathematics and Physics. Biology 
cannot be combined with AgriculturalScience  
(vi) TASUED accepts two (2)   'A' level passes in 
Chemistry, Mathematics or Physics.  
(vii) EBSU requiresNCE/two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Biology,  
Physics, chemistry, Computer, Mathematics or 
Integrated Science including five (5) credit passes in 
‘O’ level subjects w hich must include English and 
Mathematics and three (3) other science subjects, 
obtained at not more than two (2) sittings.  
(viii) BSU accepts  
(a) Preliminary degree candidates fromBenue State 
University only mustpass five (5) out of the six (6) 
subjects studied with pass of 50% in each subject.
